title: Happy Birthday, Nicocchi!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Happy Birthday, Nicocchi~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hwa-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Why are you looking around like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>There’s a rumor that if you visit someone on their birthday, you’ll take them on a heli ride somewhere. But I guess not today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! People are talking about me like that!? How miraculous~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, I guess you wouldn’t come in a heli every time. I’m sorry. It was rude of me not to thank you even though you came to celebrate my birthday. Thanks, Mari.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, don’t mind it, Nicocchi. In fact, I’m sorry, I didn’t realize you were expecting it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh? I wasn’t expecting it. I was just being cautious.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Geez~, you don’t have to hide it. I’ll call the heli right now! Wait juuuust a bit, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Wait! That’s not what I meant! I really was just being cautious, Mariii–!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
